mainText:
Steve Jobs has been a great influence on my life and so many others.

My prayers are with his family and loved ones.

I will never forget the impact that Steve Jobs has made in our World!
My son was the 2nd to tell me of the sad news, my husband was the first.
I have always wanted to work at Apple, Steve has created an organization of caring individuals.
Just last week I interviewed with Apple in Woodland Hills, CA and then heard the sad news today of such a great loss.

I am deeply saddened by the loss of Steve Jobs.
My Prayers are with the friends and family of Steve Jobs.
author: Lee
